scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run tree; npm run build-script; npm run build-style; npm run build-template; npm run build-rename; npm run build-replace
scripts.build-rename: export VERSION=`npm run version | tail -n 1`; mv dist/main.css "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.css"; mv dist/main.js "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.js"; mv dist/main.html "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.html"
scripts.build-replace: export VERSION=`npm run version | tail -n 1`; sed -i "" "s/{{VERSION}}/${VERSION}/g" "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.html"; sed -E -i "" "s/tpce\-v[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.html/tpce-${VERSION}.html/g" README.md
